Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light

Assurance (Athletics): Allows taking an automatic 38 on Athletics checks
Assurance (Farming Lore): Allows taking an automatic 32 on Farming Lore checks
Assurance (Nature): Allows taking an automatic 34 on Nature checks
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Expeditious Search: Allows Searching at 2x normal Speed
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Intimidating Glare: Allows using glare to Demoralize
Quick Jump: May use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Raging Athlete: Has a 25' climb and swim Speed, -10 jump DC, and 5' and 15' vertical and horizontal Leaps during rage
Raging Intimidation: Can use Demoralize during rage
Scare To Death: (1) R30' Successful Intimidation vs. foe Will DC inflicts frightened 2; critical success inflicts death (Fortitude save inflicts frightened 2 and flees for 1 rd); failure inflicts frightened 1
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 328 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (4 max); master) Class DC: Barbarian: 41 (strength; master)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Light Hammer (+31 1d6+5 B R20'; strength; master); Longsword (+31 1d8+5 S/P; strength; master); Sap (+31 1d6+5 B; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Animal Skin: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Armor Of Fury: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Brutality: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Devastator: Class Master (Barbarian)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Mighty Rage: Class Expert (Barbarian)
Specialization Ability: Has increased instinct ability rage effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +5
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Sawtooth Saber as one category simpler
Weapon Fury: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Animal Skin: Gives +2 AC in no armor during rage
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Allows making a melee Strike on a foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Awesome Blow: A successful Athletics vs. Fortitude with Knockback Shoves and Trips foe
Bestial Rage (Ape): Can use fists to inflict 1d12+12 HP bludgeoning during rage
Bestial Rage (Bear): Can use jaws and claws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing and 1d8+12 HP slashing during rage
Bestial Rage (Bull): Can use a horn to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Bestial Rage (Cat): Can use jaws and claws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing and 1d8+12 HP slashing during rage
Bestial Rage (Deer): Can use antlers to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing with a 10' reach during rage
Bestial Rage (Frog): Can use jaws and tongue to inflict 1d12+12 HP bludgeoning and 1d6+12 HP bludgeoning with a 10' reach during rage
Bestial Rage (Shark): Can use jaws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Bestial Rage (Snake): Can use fangs to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Bestial Rage (Wolf): Can use jaws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Brutal Bully: A successful Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip during rage inflicts 5 HP bludgeoning
Brutal Critical: Critical melee hits inflict +1 damage die and 2 damage dice bleed damage
Brutality: Critical hits with a melee weapon or unarmed attack inflict its critical specialization effect during rage
Cleave: (R) Allows a Strike an adjacent foe after killing or knocking a foe unconscious
Collateral Thrash: Allows affecting another adjacent foe (DC 41 Reflex negates) with a successful Thrash
Come And Get Me: (1) Allows suffering flat-footed and +2 HP foe damage to gain +4 temporary Hit Points from a successful Strike (critical success +8) on a successful attacker until rage ends
Contagious Rage: Allows using Share Rage unlimited times, also sharing instinct and specialization abilities
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Devastator: Successful melee Strikes ignore 10 points of physical damage resistance
Draconic Rage: Can inflict +16 HP fire damage instead of +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Dragon's Rage Breath: (2) Allows using breath to inflict 20d6 damage in a 30' cone or 60' line once per rage (Reflex negates; half distance and damage for a 2nd breath use within 1 hr)
Dragon's Rage Wings: (1) Allows flying 25' per rd during rage
Fast Movement: +10 Speed during rage
Furious Bully: Gives +2 Athletics for attacks during rage
Furious Finish: (1) Strike inflicts additional damage equal to the number of rounds remaining in rage, ending rage and causing fatigue until 10 min rest
Furious Grab: (1) Allows grabbing a foe automatically after a successful Strike
Furious Sprint: (2) Allows Striding 125' in a straight line, or 200' by using an additional action
Giant's Lunge: (1) Extends reach of melee weapons and unarmed attacks to 10' until rage ends
Giant's Stature: (1) Increases size to Large, giving +5' reach and clumsy 1, until rage ends
Great Cleave: Allows continuing to Cleave adjacent foes for as long as Strikes incapacitate
Knockback: (1) Allows Shoving a foe 5' after a successful Strike
Mighty Rage: (F) Can use a rage action when entering rage
Moment Of Clarity: (1) Allows use of concentration actions for the remainder of the turn during rage
No Escape: (R) Stride keeps pace with a retreating foe
Perfect Clarity: (R) Allows ending rage for a +2 reroll on a failed attack or Will save
Predator's Pounce: (1) Allows Striking after moving 25' in light or no armor
Quick Rage: Can rage again 1 turn after ending a rage
Rage: (1) Gains 24 temporary Hit Points and +12 HP melee damage (agile weapon +6 HP) and suffers -1 AC and no concentration actions for 1 min; requires 1 min between rages
Raging Thrower: +12 HP thrown weapon damage, and Brutal Critical and Devastator effects apply to thrown weapons during rage
Renewed Vigor: (1) Gives 14 temporary Hit Points
Second Wind: Can rage again immediately after ending a rage, suffering fatigue afterwards until 10 min rest
Shake It Off: (1) Reduces a frightened condition by 1 and a sickened condition by 1, 2, or 3 with a fail, success, or critical success on a Fortitude save during rage
Share Rage: (1) R30' Allows giving an ally the effects of Rage once per rage
Spirit Rage: May inflict +13 HP positive or negative damage, along with ghost touch, instead of +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Spirit's Wrath: (1) Allows making a R120' +33 spirit Strike that inflicts 4d8+4 HP negative or positive damage; a critical hit also inflicts frightened 1
Spirits'Interference: (1) Foe ranged Strikes require a DC 5 flat check until rage ends
Sudden Charge: (2) Can make a melee Strike after a double Stride
Sudden Leap: (2) Allows making a Strike during a Leap, High Jump, or Long Jump
Swipe: (2) Strike attacks 2 adjacent foes
Terrifying Howl: (1) R30' Allows a successful Intimidate to Demoralize multiple foes
Thrash: (1) Inflicts 17 HP bludgeoning, plus specialization damage on a grabbed foe (Fortitude negates)
Titan Mauler: Can use weapons made for a larger creature, suffering clumsy 1 and gaining +18 HP weapon damage, instead of gaining +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Titan's Stature: Increases size to Huge, giving +10' reach and clumsy 1, until rage ends
Vengeful Strike: (R) Allows using Come And Get Me to make a Strike when hit by a Strike
Vicious Evisceration: (2) Allows a Strike to inflict drained 1 (critical success drained 2)
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, and +8 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Whirlwind Strike: (3) Allows Striking each foe within reach
Wounded Rage: (R) Enters rage upon taking damage
Save: Fortitude: +32 (constitution; legendary); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Greater Juggernaut: Save Legendary (Fortitude)
Indomitable Will: Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threat are critical successes
Greater Juggernaut: Critical failures on Fortitude saves are normal failures and suffers half damage on a failed Fortitude save
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Indomitable Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Raging Resistance (Animal): Has resistance 7 to piercing and slashing during rage
Raging Resistance (Dragon): Has resistance 7 to piercing and fire during rage
Raging Resistance (Fury): Has resistance 7 to physical weapon damage during rage
Raging Resistance (Giant): Has resistance 7 to bludgeoning and choice of cold, electricity, or fire during rage
Raging Resistance (Spirit): Has resistance 7 to negative and undead during rage
Magic
Magic Notes:
Animal Rage: (1) Allows transforming into spirit animal at will
Dragon Transformation: (1) Allows using Dragon Form effects, with +20 fly Speed, +12 dragon Strikes, and +14 HP breath weapon damage, during rage
Quaking Stomp: (1) Allow using Earthquake effects once per 10 min
Notes
